sourcesContent:
import { Button, Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/styles' import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' function DonateServing(props) { const restaurantServings = useSelector(state => state.restaurantServings) const serving = restaurantServings.servings.find(item => item.id == props.match.params.id) console.log(serving) const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ dummyImage: { height: '45vh', width: '25vw', minWidth: '430px', minHeight: '25vh', marginRight: 'auto', marginLeft: '50px', marginTop: '90px', borderRadius: '5px' }, title: { ...theme.typography.content, color: '#333333', textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '3.5rem', marginBottom: '30px' }, infoDiv: { marginTop: '50px', marginBottom: '50px' }, info: { ...theme.typography.title, fontSize: '2rem', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: '30px', lineHeight: '52px', }, btn: { ...theme.buttonDef }, btnDiv: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', paddingLeft: '30px', paddingRight: '30px' } })) const classes = useStyles() return (

{serving?.name}

{serving?.description}

Ingredients : {serving?.ingredients}

Donate :

) } export default DonateServing
